cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1.2)
project(conan-libpqxx)

include(conanbuildinfo.cmake)
conan_basic_setup()

if (WIN32)
    add_definitions(-DWIN32 -D_MBCS -D_WINDOWS -DPQXX_INTERNAL -DNOMINMAX)
endif()

# execute the `find_package(PostgreSQL REQUIRED)` before libpqxx,
# because libpqxx overwrites `CMAKE_MODULE_PATH`, `FindPostgreSQL.cmake`
# generated by CONAN will not be used.
# this will cause the problem that libraries dependent on libpq will not be linked,
# so define variables first.
find_package(PostgreSQL REQUIRED)

add_subdirectory(source_subfolder)

if (BUILD_SHARED_LIBS AND WIN32)
    # Fixes build missing Windows DLL entry point: https://github.com/jtv/libpqxx/pull/167
    target_sources(pqxx_shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/source_subfolder/win32/libpqxx.cxx")
endif()
